column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////We ordered the The Malnati Chicago Classic with pepperoni on top. The crust actually resembles some type of pie crust. Right above it is sauce and sausage. Its much different than I thought as the sausage is one large piece the same diameter of the pizza. Above that is the traditional toppings of cheese
column3: and pepperoni. It was pretty amazing
column4: but after two slices it was hard to eat more. The amount of sausage is what kind of threw me off. I would have preferred less as the ratio from meat to cheese
column6: and crust was just not right. The food quality was great
column7: but it was not 5 stars for me.
